short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin allows you to optimize and compress images through CheetahO Image optimizer API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin allows you to optimize and compress images through CheetahO Image optimizer API. You can choose lossless or lossy optimization modes. At this moment supported filetypes are JPEG, PNG, GIF.
 Smaller image sizes on your website means faster page loads and less bandwidth usage. The faster your site loads, the more Google, Yahoo, Bing and other search engines will like it.
